participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is lively and spirited despite her age. She has a zest for life and embraces every moment.
participant_1.background: i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is laid-back and friendly, with a passion for technology and sports. He enjoys sharing stories about his family.
participant_2.background: i have a children and a dogs. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i am a male. i enjoy american sports.
